alert.note: Alert for Big Island Summit (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 16 at 3:36AM HST until April 17 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING FOR THE BIG ISLAND SUMMITS ABOVE 12000 FEET... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Periods of heavy snow expected with accumulations of 6 inches or greater. * WHERE...Big Island Summits above 12000 feet. * WHEN...Until 6 AM HST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Heavier bursts of snow could be accompanied by gusty winds, low visibility in clouds, and cloud to ground lightning.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning means significant amounts of snow, sleet, and ice are expected or occurring. Strong winds are also possible. This will make travel very hazardous or impossible. Any travel plans to the summits should be postponed until the threat diminishes.
